list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: continuing firmly or obstinately in a course of action in spite of difficulty or opposition.
continuing to exist or endure over a prolonged period.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: persistent rain will affect many areas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mưa dai dẳng sẽ ảnh hưởng đến nhiều khu vực

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a part of an animal or plant, such as a horn, leaf, etc.) remaining attached instead of falling off in the normal manner.
